card.name: Abrupt Decay
text: Destroy target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 3 or less.
flavor: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Divine vs. Demonic

card.name: Abyssal Specter
text: Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
flavor: It rides to a chorus of whispers that are more felt than heard.

card.name: Advent of the Wurm
text: Create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.
flavor: The consciousness of Mat'Selesnya does not always spread in peaceful ways.

card.name: Aethermage's Touch
text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. It gains "At the beginning of your end step, return this creature to its owner's hand." Then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Aethertow
text: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.
{i}(As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.){/i}

card.name: Agent of Masks
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor: "Two-faced" is an understatement.

card.name: Agony Warp
text: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.

card.name: Ancient Grudge
text: {i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}
flavor: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar—especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.

card.name: Arachnus Spinner
text: Tap an untapped Spider you control: Search your graveyard and/or library for a card named Arachnus Web and put it onto the battlefield attached to target creature. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Arachnus Web
text: Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
At the beginning of the end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, destroy Arachnus Web.

card.name: Arcane Sanctum
text: Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: "We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes."
—Tullus of Palandius

card.name: Arid Mesa
text: , Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Attended Knight
text: When Attended Knight enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
flavor: The virtues of knighthood are best taught in the field.

card.name: Auger Spree
text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.
flavor: "Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

card.name: Augur of Bolas
text: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
flavor: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

card.name: Azorius Guildgate
text: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: The Azorius symbol stares down like a great eye, reminding visitors of the watchful presence of Isperia and her lawmages.

card.name: Azorius Signet
flavor: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law—strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

card.name: Azure Mage
flavor: "We draw our power from the infinite ocean of the mind, where all manner of things can be conceived."
—Azure creed

card.name: Baloth Cage Trap
text: If an opponent had an artifact enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay
rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Banishing Stroke
text: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.
{i}(You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.){/i}

card.name: Basilisk Collar
text: Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.
flavor: During their endless travels, the mages of the Goma Fada caravan have learned ways to harness both life and death.

card.name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

card.name: Blade Splicer
text: When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control have first strike.
flavor: "Flesh is a betrayal of the self."

card.name: Blood Moon
flavor: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.

card.name: Bone Splinters
text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
flavor: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

card.name: Bonfire of the Damned
text: Bonfire of the Damned deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
{i}(You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.){/i}

card.name: Boros Guildgate
text: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: It promises protection to those in need and proclaims a warning to any who would threaten Ravnican law.

card.name: Boros Reckoner
text: Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to any target.
: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: "Imagine a thunderstorm that's also a tactical genius. That's him."
—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

card.name: Boros Signet
flavor: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."
—Agrus Kos

card.name: Bronzebeak Moa
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Bronzebeak Moa gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: They fight for their home with more loyalty than any conscript.

card.name: Broodmate Dragon
text: When Broodmate Dragon enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor: Frozen in fear, the goblins stared upward at the circling hunter—and were promptly eaten by its diving mate.

card.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add
flavor: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

card.name: Cackling Counterpart
text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
{i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}

card.name: Call of the Conclave
text: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.
flavor: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

card.name: Call of the Herd
text: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
{i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}

card.name: Carnage Gladiator
text: Whenever a creature blocks, that creature's controller loses 1 life.
flavor: Not the foulest or bloodiest act at Rix Maadi by a stretch.

card.name: Cavern of Souls
text: As Cavern of Souls enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.

card.name: Centaur Healer
text: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

card.name: Chandra's Outrage
text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

card.name: Coiling Oracle
text: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.
flavor: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

card.name: Compulsive Research
text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
flavor: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

card.name: Corpse Connoisseur
text: When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library.
{i}(: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.){/i}

card.name: Cower in Fear
text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: "You will fully understand fear when you discover it is the final thing you put your faith in."
—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Craterhoof Behemoth
text: When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Crippling Chill
text: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: One breath of the geist turns veins to rivers of ice and freezes hearts midbeat.

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

card.name: Cruel Ultimatum
text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.
flavor: There is always a greater power.

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

card.name: Crumbling Necropolis
text: Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living."
—Olcot, Rider of Joffik

card.name: Cyclonic Rift
text: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
{i}(You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each."){/i}
flavor: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.

card.name: Damnation
text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Damping Matrix
text: Activated abilities of artifacts and creatures can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
flavor: The priests tried cursing it. The mages tried dispelling it. In the end, they all obeyed it.

card.name: Deadeye Navigator
text: {i}(You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.){/i}
As long as Deadeye Navigator is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "
: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control."

card.name: Death-Hood Cobra
text: : Death-Hood Cobra gains reach until end of turn.
: Death-Hood Cobra gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor: "Size alone does not guarantee survival."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Death's Shadow
text: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.
flavor: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.

card.name: Delirium Skeins
flavor: There came a rush, a sudden fire in the mind. Then the two saw only the sooty fog of madness, heard only the crackling of their last thoughts burning away.

card.name: Deputy of Acquittals
text: {i}(You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.){/i}
When Deputy of Acquittals enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Everyone deserves a day in court."

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis

card.name: Desecration Demon
text: At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Dimir Guildgate
text: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: In the cold corridors of the undercity, misinformation unfurls from Duskmantle like a spreading stain.

card.name: Dimir Signet
flavor: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

card.name: Dinrova Horror
text: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.
flavor: "Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits."
—Sign outside Dinrova Building

card.name: Domri Rade
text: +1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
−2: Target creature you control fights another target creature.
−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."

card.name: Dragon Fodder
text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

card.name: Dregscape Zombie
text: {i}(: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.){/i}
flavor: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

card.name: Druid's Deliverance
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate.
{i}(Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.){/i}
flavor: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."

card.name: Dynacharge
text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{i}(You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each."){/i}
flavor: Nothing evens the odds like a little lightning.

card.name: Entomber Exarch
text: When Entomber Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Entreat the Angels
text: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.
{i}(You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.){/i}

card.name: Evil Twin
text: You may have Evil Twin enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "
: Destroy target creature with the same name as this creature."
flavor: You can always tell the evil one by the dagger he's sticking in you.

card.name: Explore
text: You may play an additional land this turn.
flavor: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

card.name: Extractor Demon
text: Whenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
{i}(: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.){/i}

card.name: Eyes in the Skies
text: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate.
{i}(Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.){/i}
flavor: "What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."
—Zunak, Selesnya strategist

card.name: Falkenrath Aristocrat
text: Sacrifice a creature: Falkenrath Aristocrat gains indestructible until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on Falkenrath Aristocrat.
flavor: "Your blood is quite pleasing. A pity there's not enough for both of us."

card.name: Falkenrath Noble
text: Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."

card.name: Familiar's Ruse
text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: Because of their capricious nature, faeries can serve as living lenses for disruptive magic.

card.name: Fiery Justice
text: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Target opponent gains 5 life.
flavor: When the rebels couldn't breach the castle to kill Lalor the Obstinate, they tried a more internal approach to depose the pretender king.

card.name: Fists of Ironwood
text: When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

card.name: Flickerwisp
text: When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: Its wings disturb more than air.

card.name: Forbidden Alchemy
text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
{i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}

card.name: Gaea's Anthem
flavor: "To those who can hear it, Gaea's battle song brings power as swift as sunlight and as enduring as the deep roots of the forest."
—Gamelen, Citanul elder

card.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
text: , Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: "The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

card.name: Ghostly Flicker
text: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.
flavor: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.

card.name: Giantbaiting
text: Create a 4/4 red and green Giant Warrior creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
{i}(As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.){/i}

card.name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
flavor: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."

card.name: Gift of Orzhova
text: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.
flavor: "Remember by whose gift you ascend."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

card.name: Gifts Ungiven
text: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Gnawing Zombie
text: , Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: On still nights you can hear its rotted teeth grinding tirelessly on scavenged bones.

card.name: Goblin Assault
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste.
Goblin creatures attack each combat if able.
flavor: A goblin raid is a delicate gambit—a blend of stealth, precision, and screaming death.

card.name: Goblin Electromancer
text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost
flavor: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."

card.name: Goblin Guide
text: Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into their hand.
flavor: "I've been all over this world. I even remember some of those places."

card.name: Golgari Germination
text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.

card.name: Golgari Guildgate
text: Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Every part of the gate was reclaimed from forgotten ruins and imbued with new purpose by the Swarm.

card.name: Golgari Rotwurm
text: , Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.
flavor: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.

card.name: Golgari Signet
flavor: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

card.name: Graceful Reprieve
text: When target creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor: "In my moment of death, I had a vision of the world, dark and unwelcoming. I wanted to hide in the deepest meander, but the light pulled me back."

card.name: Grafdigger's Cage
text: Creature cards in graveyards and libraries can't enter the battlefield.
Players can't cast spells from graveyards or libraries.
flavor: "If you wind up in one of mine, you can be sure as silver it will be your last."
—Grafdigger Wulmer

card.name: Grasp of Phantoms
text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
{i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}

card.name: Griselbrand
flavor: "Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

card.name: Grisly Spectacle
text: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Grixis Slavedriver
text: When Grixis Slavedriver leaves the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
{i}(: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.){/i}

card.name: Ground Assault
text: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
flavor: "Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing."
—Narbulg Nine Fingers

card.name: Gruul Guildgate
text: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: The scarred rubble around the gate is testament to past meetings of the Clans, summits that inevitably devolved into brawls.

card.name: Gruul Signet
flavor: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

card.name: Gruul War Chant
text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.
flavor: "We are the heart of the wild, the fire in its eyes, and the howl in its throat. Come, join the battle to which you were born."
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

card.name: Hanweir Lancer
text: {i}(You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.){/i}
As long as Hanweir Lancer is paired with another creature, both creatures have first strike.

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Elves vs. Goblins
Duel Decks Anthology, Garruk vs. Liliana

card.name: Harmonize
flavor: "Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing."
—Seton, centaur druid

card.name: Hellrider
text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.
flavor: "Behind every devil's mayhem lurks a demon's scheme."
—Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

card.name: Hungry Spriggan
text: Whenever Hungry Spriggan attacks, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: If a spriggan's eyes are larger than its stomach, it has ways to remedy the situation.

card.name: Inquisition of Kozilek
text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.
flavor: After the awakening of the Eldrazi, some vampires took it upon themselves to remind the others where their loyalty should lie.

card.name: Intangible Virtue
text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
flavor: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.

card.name: Izzet Charm
text: • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays
• Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

card.name: Izzet Guildgate
text: Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Beyond lies the culmination of all Izzet projects, a grand experiment led by the dragon Niv-Mizzet himself.

card.name: Izzet Signet
flavor: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

card.name: Jungle Shrine
text: Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.

card.name: Kathari Bomber
text: When Kathari Bomber deals combat damage to a player, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens and sacrifice Kathari Bomber.
{i}(: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.){/i}

card.name: Kor Hookmaster
text: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

card.name: Kor Skyfisher
text: When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."

card.name: Kraken Hatchling
flavor: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

card.name: Liliana of the Veil
text: −6: Separate all permanents target player controls into two piles. That player sacrifices all permanents in the pile of their choice.

card.name: Lingering Souls
text: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
{i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}
flavor: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

card.name: Linvala, Keeper of Silence
text: Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.
flavor: Those who seek to disturb the harmony of life will see their instruments taken from them.

card.name: Lone Missionary
text: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.

card.name: Madcap Skills
text: Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has menace.
flavor: The larger the crowd, the harder it is for them to run away.

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra

card.name: Magma Jet
text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.
flavor: Some Akroans make the dangerous pilgrimage to the volcanic temples of Purphoros, where oracles known as flamespeakers glean omens from lava.

card.name: Marsh Flats
text: , Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Master Splicer
text: When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
flavor: With Phyrexia's victory at hand, each sect began perfecting its vision.

card.name: Might of Old Krosa
text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.
flavor: "Krosa the great. Krosa the enduring. Look to the forest, and it will share its bounty."
—Zyd, Kamahlite druid

card.name: Mind Shatter
text: Target player discards X cards at random.
flavor: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.

card.name: Mist Raven
text: When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in."
—Sved, fisherman of Nephalia

card.name: Mistmeadow Witch
text: : Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: Olka collected the evening mist for years, studying its secrets. Once she learned its essence, she could vanish with a thought.

card.name: Misty Rainforest
text: , Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Misty Rainforest: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Mizzium Mortars
text: Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control.
{i}(You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each."){/i}

allSets.name: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning

card.name: Mogg Flunkies
text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
flavor: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

card.name: Molten Rain
text: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, Molten Rain deals 2 damage to the land's controller.
flavor: It came as a cruel answer to the farmers' prayers.

card.name: Momentary Blink
text: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
{i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

card.name: Moroii
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.
flavor: "Touched by moroii"
—Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

card.name: Mortician Beetle
text: Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Mortician Beetle.
flavor: To the soldier, war is famine; to the scavenger, a feast.

allSets.name: Duel Decks Anthology, Elves vs. Goblins

card.name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

card.name: Mystic Genesis
text: Counter target spell. Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor: "The Simic can grow anything out of a puddle of sludge. I just hope they never join forces with the Golgari."
—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

card.name: Mystical Teachings
text: Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
{i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}

card.name: Night Terrors
text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
flavor: Innistrad is a place where dreams invade the mind and mere shadows exact a terrible toll.

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius
text: Whenever Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals damage to a player, you may draw a card.
: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: He has no patience for minds that do not inspire him or explode by trying.

card.name: Obzedat, Ghost Council
text: When Obzedat, Ghost Council enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
At the beginning of your end step, you may exile Obzedat. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.

card.name: Ogre Jailbreaker
text: Ogre Jailbreaker can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as you control a Gate.
flavor: It took three years for it to occur to him to use the chain as a weapon, but once it did, he made up for lost time.

card.name: Olivia Voldaren
text: : Olivia Voldaren deals 1 damage to another target creature. That creature becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on Olivia Voldaren.
: Gain control of target Vampire for as long as you control Olivia Voldaren.

card.name: Opportunity
flavor: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."

card.name: Orzhov Guildgate
text: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: "We do not believe in hiding our wealth in the shadows. This is Orzhov, and this is how we reward greatness."
—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

card.name: Orzhov Signet
flavor: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

card.name: Past in Flames
text: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.
{i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}

card.name: Path to Exile
text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Penumbra Spider
text: When Penumbra Spider dies, create a 2/4 black Spider creature token with reach.
flavor: When it snared a passing cockatrice, its own soul darkly doubled.

card.name: Phantasmal Image
text: You may have Phantasmal Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

card.name: Pilfered Plans
text: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Draw two cards.
flavor: Mirko Vosk hunted anyone with knowledge of the maze, draining the chances of the other guilds.

card.name: Pit Keeper
text: When Pit Keeper enters the battlefield, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "The undead are not ‘awakened.' They are evicted when there is no room left in the pit for more bodies."

card.name: Pitfall Trap
text: If exactly one creature is attacking, you may pay
rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target attacking creature without flying.
flavor: Each spike is poisoned—the trapmaker's idea of mercy.

card.name: Primal Command
text: • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library.
• Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
• Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Putrefy
text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "We are all decaying, always in a state of near-death. One moment without breath and we begin to break down."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

card.name: Pyrewild Shaman
text: , Discard Pyrewild Shaman: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Pyrewild Shaman is in your graveyard, you may pay
. If you do, return Pyrewild Shaman to your hand.

card.name: Pyroclasm
text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
flavor: "Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?"
—Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Pyromancer Ascension
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on Pyromancer Ascension.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while Pyromancer Ascension has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Rakdos Guildgate
text: Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Maze-runners who pass through the Rakdos gate leave behind their scruples and a significant amount of skin.

card.name: Rakdos Signet
flavor: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

card.name: Ranger of Eos
text: When Ranger of Eos enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two creature cards with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
flavor: At his side, humble beasts become weapons more deadly than sharpened steel.

card.name: Recover
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Wisdom from the past is best gathered directly from the source."

card.name: Restoration Angel
text: When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Revive
text: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: Even what is lost beyond recall returns when coaxed by a dryad's hand.

card.name: Rewind
text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
flavor: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."

card.name: Rhox War Monk
flavor: Rhox monks are dedicated to spiritual growth and learning, and most bear the sigils of many students. However, they do not gladly suffer fools or those who disagree with their carefully wrought dogma.

card.name: Rootborn Defenses
text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
{i}(To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.){/i}

card.name: Rubblebelt Maaka
text: , Discard Rubblebelt Maaka: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor: "The maaka remain loyal to us in this time of strife. We don't even have to feed them—our enemies do."
—Nedja, Gruul shaman

card.name: Savage Lands
text: Savage Lands enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.

card.name: Scalding Tarn
text: , Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Scavenging Ooze
text: : Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.
flavor: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

card.name: Scorched Rusalka
text: , Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

card.name: Scourge Devil
text: When Scourge Devil enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
{i}(: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.){/i}

card.name: Sea Gate Oracle
text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
flavor: "The secret entrance should be near."

card.name: Seal of Doom
text: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: "A basilisk's gaze is effective, but disposing of physical remains is a tiresome task. It's far more discreet to dissolve one's victim entirely."
—Szadek

card.name: Seal of Primordium
text: Sacrifice Seal of Primordium: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "I am the simplifier, the root that drags all artifice to earth."
—Seal inscription

card.name: Séance
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Seaside Citadel
text: Seaside Citadel enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.

card.name: Sedraxis Specter
text: Whenever Sedraxis Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
{i}(: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.){/i}

card.name: Selesnya Guildgate
text: Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: The Selesyna welcome all to help them heal the city's wounds. The price, however, is devotion to the guild and a selfless belief in Trostani.

card.name: Selesnya Signet
flavor: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

card.name: Sensor Splicer
text: When Sensor Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control have vigilance.
flavor: With clarity of vision comes clarity of function.

card.name: Serum Visions
flavor: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.

card.name: Sever the Bloodline
text: Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature.
{i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}

card.name: Shimmering Grotto
text: : Add one mana of any color.
flavor: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.

card.name: Simic Guildgate
text: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor: Simic biomancers don't concern themselves with guarding a gate. Their ever-present creations are enough to ward off trespassers.

card.name: Simic Signet
flavor: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

card.name: Simic Sky Swallower
text: {i}(This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.){/i}
flavor: "We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design."
—Momir Vig

card.name: Sin Collector
text: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.
flavor: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

card.name: Skirsdag Cultist
text: , Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor: "Within blood is life. Within life is fire. Within fire is the path to our masters' glory!"

card.name: Skyknight Legionnaire
flavor: "I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead."
—Razia

card.name: Slaughterhorn
text: , Discard Slaughterhorn: Target attacking creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The Orzhov clergy would never cross its path, but sending thrull couriers to do so is cheap and entertaining.

card.name: Slime Molding
text: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token.
flavor: "Give me enough refuse and mana and I will summon an ooze that can engulf all of Ravnica."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

card.name: Snapcaster Mage
text: When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.
{i}(You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}

card.name: Soul Manipulation
text: • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: "Birth and death are both reversible."
—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Soul Ransom
text: Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only any opponent may activate this ability.

card.name: Soul Warden
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

card.name: Spell Pierce
text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays
flavor: "There's a hole in your plan."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Sphinx's Revelation
text: You gain X life and draw X cards.
flavor: "Let the knowledge of absolute law inspire you to live a life of absolute order."

card.name: Spike Jester
flavor: For the Rakdos, "suicidal charge" and "good showmanship" are one and the same.

card.name: Spire Monitor
text: {i}(You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.){/i}
flavor: Each monitor is given an eye for each spire it is to guard.

card.name: Sprouting Thrinax
text: When Sprouting Thrinax dies, create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor: The vast network of predation on Jund has actually caused some strange creatures to adapt to being eaten.

card.name: Stoic Angel
text: Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.
flavor: Even the most battle-hardened soldiers pause in her presence for a moment of introspection.

card.name: Stony Silence
text: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.
flavor: The relic's purpose? Its design? Whatever the intent, it is now a mere curiosity that breaks up the horizon.

card.name: Strength in Numbers
text: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
flavor: "The hermit dies. The outcast dies. The lone wolf dies. Only those who stick together survive this world."
—Uros, Pendelhaven elder

card.name: Summoning Trap
text: If a creature spell you cast this turn was countered by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay
rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Sundering Growth
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate.
{i}(Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.){/i}
flavor: "One day every pillar will be a tree and every hall a glade."
—Trostani

card.name: Sunhome Guildmage
text: : Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
: Create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste.

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

card.name: Sylvan Ranger
text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

card.name: Talon Trooper
flavor: "The volcanic winds make a maze of the skies of Jund. If we mean to invade, we must first learn their invisible paths."

card.name: Tandem Lookout
text: {i}(You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.){/i}
As long as Tandem Lookout is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card."

card.name: Tarmogoyf
text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
flavor: What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.

card.name: Tattermunge Witch
text: : Each blocked creature gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: The Tattermunge gang has no words for the spell that whips their instinctual rage into a frenzy. They only know they like it.

card.name: Teleportal
text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
{i}(You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each."){/i}

card.name: Temporal Mastery
text: Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Mastery.
{i}(You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.){/i}
flavor: Time is a marvelous plaything.

card.name: Terminate
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: All suns must set.

card.name: Terminus
text: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.
{i}(You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.){/i}

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition

card.name: Thornscape Battlemage
text: {i}(You may pay an additional and/or as you cast this spell.){/i}
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its
kicker, it deals 2 damage to any target.
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its

card.name: Thragtusk
text: When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor: "Always carry two spears."
—Mokgar, Kalonian hunter

card.name: Thunderous Wrath
text: Thunderous Wrath deals 5 damage to any target.
{i}(You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.){/i}

card.name: Thundersong Trumpeter
text: : Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
flavor: "Hear that? Those notes mean we've arrived at Sunhome! Let our allies' hearts soar and our enemies' hearts shatter at the sound!"
—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

card.name: Torrent of Souls
text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if
was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if
was spent to cast Torrent of Souls.

card.name: Tower Gargoyle
flavor: "Esper, like any work of art, can be truly appreciated only from a distance."
—Tezzeret

card.name: Traitorous Instinct
text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.
flavor: The horror lurched about like a puppet from a madman's nightmare, squeezing the life from its own kind.

card.name: Ulvenwald Tracker
text: : Target creature you control fights another target creature.
flavor: "Peace will come to Innistrad, but only after all abominations have been dealt with, one by one."

card.name: Unburial Rites
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{i}(You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.){/i}
flavor: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.

card.name: Unflinching Courage
text: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.
{i}(Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.){/i}
flavor: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.

card.name: Urban Evolution
text: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.
flavor: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

card.name: Urbis Protector
text: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
flavor: "Guilds be damned. We can fend for ourselves."
—Vennick of the Gateless

card.name: Vampire Aristocrat
text: Sacrifice a creature: Vampire Aristocrat gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "I admit, I am a creature of the city. The sights, the nightly excitement, the abundance of fine drink . . ."

card.name: Vampire Nighthawk
flavor: As they fought the Eldrazi, many vampires learned to live among humans. Others were unable to make the adjustment.

card.name: Vanish into Memory
text: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor: Out of sight, into mind.

card.name: Venser, Shaper Savant
text: When Venser, Shaper Savant enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.

card.name: Verdant Catacombs
text: , Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Catacombs: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Vital Splicer
text: When Vital Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
flavor: "For every one that falls, ten shall rise. The revelation of New Phyrexia is at hand."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Vithian Stinger
text: : Vithian Stinger deals 1 damage to any target.
{i}(: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.){/i}

card.name: Voice of Resurgence
text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or when Voice of Resurgence dies, create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

card.name: Wake the Reflections
text: {i}(Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.){/i}
flavor: "You see a bird, an oak, a packbeast. I see the potential for an army."
—Lalia, Selesnya dryad

card.name: Wall of Denial
text: {i}(This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.){/i}
flavor: It provides what every discerning mage requires—time to think.

card.name: Wall of Frost
text: Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor: "I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid."
—Lumi, goatherd

card.name: Wayfaring Temple
text: Wayfaring Temple's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
Whenever Wayfaring Temple deals combat damage to a player, populate.
{i}(Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.){/i}

card.name: Wing Splicer
text: When Wing Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control have flying.
flavor: "Progress is our great inheritance, perfection our ultimate destination."

card.name: Wingcrafter
text: {i}(You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.){/i}
As long as Wingcrafter is paired with another creature, both creatures have flying.

allSets.name: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

card.name: Woolly Thoctar
flavor: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.

card.name: Wort, the Raidmother
text: When Wort, the Raidmother enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red and green Goblin Warrior creature tokens.
Each red or green instant or sorcery spell you cast has conspire.
{i}(As you cast the spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose new targets for the copy.){/i}

card.name: Youthful Knight
flavor: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die."
—Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Zealous Conscripts
text: When Zealous Conscripts enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Zur the Enchanter
text: Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.
flavor: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.
